location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Memorandum and Articles of Association of Petroleum Development (Trucial Coast) Limited, and of Petroleum Development (Qatar) Limited

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Two printed pamphlets with bound pages.Foliation: The file's foliation sequence is written in pencil, circled, and is located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of two bound and printed pamphlets as follows:1) Memorandum and Articles of Association of Petroleum Development (Trucial Coast) Limited. Incorporated the 30th day of September, 1936. (folios 171-190).2) Memorandum and Articles of Association of Petroleum Development (Qatar) Limited. Incorporated the 21st day of August, 1936. (folios 191-210).
